verse: यः कृष्ण सापि राधा च या राधा कृष्ण एव सः । एकं ज्योतिर्द्विधा भिन्नं राधमाध्वरूपकम्

terms.राधामाध्वरूपकम् (rādhāmādhvarūpakam): representing the forms of Radha and Krishna

meaning: Breakdown:Meaning:The one who is Krishna and she who is Radha, they are indeed the same. They are a single light that is twofold, representing the distinct forms of Radha and Krishna.
